import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Card,Container,Row,Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {Switch} from "react-router-dom"; export default class stateReport extends Component { state = { global_deaths:'', global_new_cases:'', global_new_deaths:'', global_recovered:'', global_total_cases:'', local_active_cases:'', local_deaths:'', local_new_cases:'', local_new_deaths:'', local_total_cases:'', total_pcr_testing_count:'' }; componentDidMount() { fetch("https://hpb.health.gov.lk/api/get-current-statistical") .then(Response => Response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data.data) // console.log(this.state.local_recovered) this.setState({ global_deaths: data.data.global_deaths }); this.setState({ global_new_cases: data.data.global_new_cases }); this.setState({ global_new_deaths: data.data.global_new_deaths }); this.setState({ global_recovered: data.data.global_recovered }); this.setState({ global_total_cases: data.data.global_total_cases }); this.setState({ local_active_cases: data.data.local_active_cases }); this.setState({ local_deaths: data.data.local_deaths }); this.setState({ local_deaths: data.data.local_deaths }); this.setState({ local_new_cases: data.data.local_new_cases }); this.setState({ local_new_deaths: data.data.local_new_deaths }); this.setState({ local_total_cases: data.data.local_total_cases }); this.setState({ total_pcr_testing_count: data.data.total_pcr_testing_count }); }) } render() { // const {covid_data} = this.state; return ( global_deaths

{this.state.global_deaths}

 global_new_cases
